meanings.definition: A person who inherits or is entitled to inherit property or a title from someone else.
meanings.sent1: The inheritor of the family estate was overjoyed with their unexpected inheritance.
meanings.sent2: The inheritor of the crown was preparing for the responsibilities that came with the title.
meanings.sent3: The inheritor of the magical amulet accidentally turned their cat into a talking parrot!
meanings.sent4: As the inheritor of her mother's wisdom, she carried on her legacy with grace.
meanings.sent5: The inheritor of the ancient sword felt its power coursing through their veins.
